articles.content: NewsGambhir will mentor the Lucknow (IPL) and Durban (SA20) franchises, both of which are part of the RPSG group

articles.title: 'Pichle ek saal se jis tarah se matches huye hain...': Rizwan on IND vs PAK - Hindustan Times
